text: Bajuz un mushrikeen ke jinsey tumne muhaide (treaties) kiya phir unhon ne apne ahad ko poora karne mein tumhare saath koi kami nahin ki aur na tumhare khilaf kisi ki madad ki, to aisey logon ke saath tum bhi muddat e muhaida tak wafa karo kyunke Allah muttaqiyon (poious) hi ko pasand karta hai
